t: Old World Lumber | Old World Lumber, LLC Reclaimed Lumber sourced from Montana
s: We are always seeking turn of the century barns, warehouses, and other structures constructed of rough sawn lumber and heavy timber. We have dismantled hundreds of barns, dozens of warehouses, along with other structures such as mining camps, sawmills, and commercial properties.

t: What We Do | Old World Lumber, LLC
s: October 6, 2019 - Old World Lumber LLC has been salvaging and producing fine reclaimed lumber and barn wood for over 15 years. Our work has taken us all across the country, from turn-of-the-century barns and industrial warehouses to the feedlots and fences of western ranches in Montana.
